title: Chicken pasta bake for a crowd
ingredients: ['500g spaghetti, broken into pieces', '3 (295g) tins condensed cream of mushroom soup', '340g grated Cheddar cheese', '850g boiled chicken breast meat, shredded', '1 pound sauteed mushrooms', '1/2 (250g) jar roasted red peppers, drained and sliced', '475ml reserved chicken stock']
